articles.title: DPRK Succeeds in Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
articles.content:
DPRK Succeeds in Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK made public the following statement Friday:
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK carried out a nuclear explosion test for the judgment of the power of a nuclear warhead newly studied and manufactured by them at the northern nuclear test ground under the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for building strategic nuclear force.
					
					 The Central Committee of the WPK sent warm congratulations to nuclear scientists and technicians of the northern nuclear test ground on the successful nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 The nuclear test finally examined and confirmed the structure and specific features of movement of nuclear warhead that has been standardized to be able to be mounted on strategic ballistic rockets of the Hwasong artillery pieces units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army as well as its performance and power.
					
					 It was confirmed through the results of analysis of the test that the measured values including explosion might and the nuclear material use coefficient conformed with the calculated values and that there was no radioactive materials leakage during the test and, therefore, no adverse impact on the ecological environment of the surroundings.
					
					 The standardization of the nuclear warhead will enable the DPRK to produce at will and as many as it wants a variety of smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads of higher strike power with a firm hold on the technology for producing and using various fissile materials. This has definitely put on a higher level the DPRK's technology of mounting nuclear warheads on ballistic rockets.
					
					 The nuclear warhead explosion test is a demonstration of the toughest will of the WPK and the Korean people to get themselves always ready to retaliate against the enemies if they make provocation as it is part of practical countermeasures to the racket of threat and sanctions against the DPRK kicked up by the U.S.-led hostile forces who have gone desperate in their moves to find fault with the sovereign state's exercise of the right to self-defence while categorically denying the DPRK's strategic position as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 We will take further measures to bolster the state nuclear force in quality and quantity for safeguarding the dignity and the right to existence of the DPRK and genuine peace from the U.S. increasing threat of a nuclear war.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Anti-DPRK Invective of U.S. Official
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Anti-DPRK Invective of U.S. Official 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that the deputy security advisor of the National Security Council of the White House again made remarks slandering the DPRK:
					 The deputy security adviser at a press conference in Vientiane spouted vituperations that they will have to be more awakened to implement sanctions against north Korea, adding that if north Korea abandons nuclear and ballistic missile programme, the U.S. may think over.
					
					 It is the shining fruition of the self-reliance and self-development that the DPRK ranked itself with dignity among the military powers, being possessed of perfect nuclear attack capabilities despite the toughest sanctions of the U.S.-led hostile forces.
					
					 The U.S. intensified hostile policy and hideous nuclear threat and blackmail only resulted in making the DPRK bolster its nuclear attack capabilities in a phased way.
					
					 The U.S. desperate moves for unilaterally putting sanctions and stifling the DPRK are a hideous crime against humanity aimed at subversion of a social system of a sovereignty country as they violate the right to development and existence of the country.
					
					 The U.S.-touted UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK assume the nature of reprisal banned by international law and, therefore, they are nothing but criminal documents devoid of impartiality, lawfulness and morality.
					
					 The U.S. is calling for tightening sanctions and pressure on the DPRK while trying to deploy THAAD in south Korea but it is nothing but a sigh of losers taken aback by the tremendous military capabilities of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is a strategic line to be constantly held fast to as long as the imperialists' nuclear threat and arbitrary practices go on, and if one thinks the DPRK can change its road, it is a pipedream.
					
					 The U.S. should never underestimate the tremendous mental power and inexhaustible might of the DPRK. The U.S. will be made to clearly see how the DPRK rises imposingly out of chains of sanctions, blockade and pressure.

articles.title: Greetings to Brazilian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Brazilian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Michel Elias Temer Lulia, president of the Federative Republic of Brazil, on September 7 on the 194th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Brazilian FM
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Jose Serra, foreign minister of Brazil, on the 194th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Zambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zambian President
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Edgar Lungu on September 7 upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Zambia.
					The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger and sincerely wished the Zambian president good health and happiness and bigger successes in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party, state and army visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					  Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					  Placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					   Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK. Also laid was a floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					   The participants paid high tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					   They made bows to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					   They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Banquet Given on 68th Founding Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
Banquet Given on 68th Founding Anniversary of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the People's Palace of Culture Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, the state and the army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of armed forces, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, former un-converted long-term prisoners, officials of the army and the society who set an example in the 200-day campaign of loyalty, persons of distinguished services, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were couples of diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made an address.
					
					 The speaker said that September of this significant year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK was held makes the Korean people look back upon the proud route of victory covered by them under the leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. The DPRK is demonstrating its might to the world as Juche power and invincible military power strong with independence and Songun and a genuine people's state guided by the people-first principle, he said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK would advance straight forward along the unchangeable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and build the best country and people's paradise on this land with a firm hold on the general line of the WPK and the principle of giving priority to self-development.
					
					 The DPRK government will pave a broad avenue to independent reunification in the idea of national independence and great national unity, ensure global peace and security and expand and develop the foreign relations as befitting its position as an independent power and a nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Music, Dance and Poem Presentation Given
articles.content:
Music, Dance and Poem Presentation Given
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Presentation of music, dance and poem "Story told by 'Arirang'" was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and those in Pyongyang and persons of merits.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys and representative of international bodies here and their spouses, military attaches and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 Folk songs, national instrumental music pieces, dance pieces and song and dance works comprehensively and impressively dealt with the time-honored history of the Korean nation created along with Arirang.
					
					 In such numbers as female solo and grand kayagum ensemble "Arirang" the performers gave artistic presentation to the past and present of the DPRK when a definite end was put to the history of twists and turns and the dignity of the country and nation were put on the highest level thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience for reflecting the iron-will of all service persons and people to glorify the DPRK as the eternal state of the great leaders and dynamically advance along the path of building a socialist power indicated at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Celebrate Founding Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Celebrate Founding Anniversary of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Youth gathered at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and other places of Pyongyang after hearing the news of the successful nuclear warhead explosive test.
					
					 Dancing parties began with the playing of the song "Joy of the People."
					
					 The participants turned the venues into the sea of dancers in boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built a socialist state demonstrating its might by dint of independence and Songun and laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The atmosphere of dancing parties reached the height when dynamic and light music such as "Girls Riding on Galloping Steeds" and "Ongheya" resounded throughout the venues.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in all provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Putin
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Putin
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Friday.
					 The message said:
					
					 The respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Un
					
					 I extend heartfelt congratulations to you on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The relations between the Russian Federation and the DPRK assume traditionally friendly nature.
					
					 I am convinced that to further develop the beneficial bilateral cooperation in various fields is in line with the basic interests of the peoples of our two countries and will contribute to strengthening security and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the whole of Northeast Asia.
					
					 I wish you good health and success and all the people of the DPRK happiness and wellbeing.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, on Friday.
					 The message said:
					
					 The respected Comrade
					
					 I extend the warmest congratulations to you on the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 I extend fraternal greeting to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Presidency of Bosnia-Herzegovina
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Presidency of Bosnia-Herzegovina 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Bakir Izetbegovic, president of the Presidency of Bosnia-Herzegovina, on Friday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I have the glory and joy of wishing the prosperity of your country, extending sincere congratulations to you and your people on the founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the Presidency of Bosnia-Herzegovina and on my own behalf.
					
					 I express belief that the good friendly relations between Bosnia-Herzegovina and the DPRK would continue developing for the global peace and stability in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Expressing the noblest respect to Your Excellency, I sincerely wish you and the people of the DPRK happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on September 6.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un, the DPRK government and people on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 It wished the bilateral relations good development in all fields by the joint cooperation and efforts of the officials of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of the Democratic People's Republic of Algeria, on Aug. 31.
					 The message said:
					
					 Being pleased to extend the warmest congratulations to Your Excellency on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Algeria and on my own behalf, I sincerely wish Your Excellency good health at all times and, at the same time, the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 Availing myself of the opportunity when I celebrate this glorious occasion, I am satisfied with the cooperative ties between our two countries, reaffirming that I will together with Your Excellency make efforts to strengthen the friendly ties in the common interests and desire of the two friendly peoples.
					
					 I extend the noblest respect to Your Excellency Chairman.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda, on Sept. 1.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend the warmest congratulations and best wishes to Your Excellency and the government and people of the DPRK on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The Republic of Uganda values very much the historic relations of friendship existing between our two countries
					
					 I hope that the bilateral relations between the DPRK and Uganda will grow stronger in the interests of the two governments and peoples.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and the fraternal Korean people success and prosperity only.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Sept. 1.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend the warmest congratulations to you on Sept. 9, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK, on behalf of all members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf.
					
					 The DPRK, founded by President Kim Il Sung and strengthened and developed by leader Kim Jong Il, is now turning into a socialist political and military power, bravely shattering all aggression and provocation moves of the imperialist allied forces and winning victory.
					
					 The heroic struggle of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country, the dignity of the nation and the peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world serves as a model of the world revolutionaries and progressive people struggling to build an equal and just new society.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I most sincerely wish you good health and greater success in your noble work for the prosperity of the DPRK and the happiness of the Korean people, convinced that thanks to your wise leadership, the feats of President Kim Il Sung in building a socialist state and those of Kim Jong Il in leading the state will go down forever.
					
					 I express noble respect to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mulatu Teshome, president of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, on Sept. 2.
					 The president in the message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and people of the DPRK on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Ethiopia and on his own behalf.
					
					 He reaffirmed that he would boost the bilateral relations.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the people of the DPRK progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, on Sept. 6.
					 The king in the message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the royal family and people of Cambodia and on his own behalf and sincerely wished Kim Jong Un great success in the accomplishment of the historic cause of him leading the Korean nation and state.
					
					 He ardently wished the fraternal people of the DPRK happiness and prosperity.
					
					 He was convinced that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries will steadily develop.
					
					 He expressed noblest respect to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Eritrea
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Eritrea
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Issaias Afewerki, president of the State of Eritrea, on Sept. 6.
					 The president in his message said that he deemed it the great honor to extend his sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of the State of Eritrea and on his own behalf.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work and the people of the DPRK steady prosperity and peace.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Joko Widodo, president of the Republic of Indonesia, on September 7.
					 In the message the president extended the warmest congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un on the founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the Indonesian government and people.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK would grow stronger and that the two countries would promote peace and well-being in the interests of the peoples of the two countries through mutual cooperation.
					
					 He expressed the highest respect to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the DR Congo, on September 3.
					 In the message the president extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the national day of the DPRK on behalf of all the people of the DR Congo and on his own behalf.
					
					 The president reaffirmed his will to boost the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries together with Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed high respect to Kim Jong Un, wishing him good health and greater success in his work for leading the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Htin Kyaw, president of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, on September 5.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 It expressed the highest respect to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tunisian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tunisian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mohamed Al Beji Caid Essebssi, president of the Republic of Tunisia, on August 26.
					 The president in the message said that he was pleased to extend the warmest congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un on the national day of the DPRK.
					
					 The president sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people greater progress and development.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Associated with Birth of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Associated with Birth of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 68th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 On the anniversary, the Korean people are recalling with deep emotion the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed to build a new country where the working masses play a role of its master.
					
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, Kim Il Sung called for building a democratic people's republic representing the interests of all Koreans, proceeding from the characters and duty of the Korean revolution. And he stressed that the republic should be built by the Koreans themselves and, to this end, it is needed to form a democratic national united front embracing all the democratic forces led by the working class.
					
					 He also showed deep care for the institution of national emblem, flag and anthem. He said that the national emblem and flag should symbolize the DPRK as a dignified, independent and sovereign state. And he personally guided the work for writing words of "The Patriotic Song" (National Anthem).
					
					 Under his wise guidance, the birth of the DPRK was declared on September 9, Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 With the foundation of the DPRK, the Korean people could become a genuine master of the state and society and a dignified people independently carving out their destiny. And the country could turn into a full-fledged independent and sovereign state.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, working people and school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 A floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), was seen standing before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and schools at all levels in the city.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Visitors paid tributes to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of the units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions and enterprises were laid before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang and portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches here, delegations and delegates of the Juche idea study organizations, a member of the House of Councilors of Japan and his party, the group of Koreans in Japan to celebrate the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Wreathes Laid before Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreathes Laid before Cemeteries
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreathes were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Wreathes in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), were seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and working people in the city.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 A wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet were laid on the wreath-laying stands of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri,  a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Laid before the cemeteries were wreathes in the names of the armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions of science, education, public health and media, and party and power organs, enterprises and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters who dedicated their lives to the country's liberation, people's freedom and happiness and to the struggle for achieving national reunification and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					They looked round the cemeteries.
					
					On the same day wreathes, bouquets and flowers were placed before the statues of the martyrs, cemeteries of the fallen fighters, monuments to the fallen soldiers of the KPA and cemeteries of fallen fighters across the country.

articles.title: National Agricultural Workers' Basketball Contest Held
articles.content:
National Agricultural Workers' Basketball Contest Held
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The 12th national agricultural workers' basketball contest was held in Pyongyang between Sept. 5 and 9 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The contest was held in the Rungna People's Sports Park. Men's and women's teams from all provinces competed by group league matches and on a knock-out basis.
					
					 The men's team of North Phyongan Province and the women's team of South Hamgyong Province came first in the contest.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 68th founding anniversary.
					 Many people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 They made bows before the portraits of the smiling great leaders at the plaza.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas, deeply recollecting the revolutionary careers of the great leaders.
					
					 Colorful performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas to gorgeously celebrate the holiday.
					
					 Concert, music and dance performance, revolutionary opera, revolutionary drama, circus and jugglery were presented in Pyongyang.
					
					 Art performances were given by officials, artistes, working people, women's union members and youth and students in all provinces.
					
					 Youth and students across the country presented dancing parties to add festive atmosphere.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Friday, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The message said that the glorious course covered by the DPRK is a proud history in which the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il ushered in a prosperous era unprecedented in the national history spanning five thousand years with their extraordinary ideas and theories, gifted wisdom, gigantic revolutionary practice and noble patriotic devotion, won only victories in the confrontation with the U.S. and the building of a socialist power and thus put the dignity and position of the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 It noted that President Kim Il Sung made the Koreans in Japan emerge overseas citizens of the full-fledged independent and sovereign state, formed Chongryon with the original policy of making a switchover in the line and thus put the movement of the Koreans in Japan on the orbit of Juche.
					
					 It noted that leader Kim Jong Il called the officials of Chongryon comrades in the same trench and Koreans in Japan members of the same family and showed all paternal loving care for Chongryon, saying that he liked to do everything for it.
					
					 It said that the undying feats of the great leaders and the loving care shown by them for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are shedding more brilliant rays thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We will more thoroughly establish your monolithic leadership system in the organization as required by the present time when the movement of Koreans in Japan has entered a new phase together with the Juche cause, and further strengthen Chongryon into the powerful Juche-based overseas compatriots organization devotedly upholding your high prestige and implementing the instructions given by you without fail by dint of the single-minded unity of the ranks and harmonious whole.
					
					 We will conduct the 100-day campaign for greeting the conference of Chongryon branches which will be held in the historic period when the Juche cause has entered a new high stage and adorn this significant year as the year of great advance more powerfully demonstrating before the whole world the might of Chongryon which has grown under the care of the great leaders.

articles.title: Course of Glory Covered by DPRK under Guidance of Great Persons
articles.content:
Course of Glory Covered by DPRK under Guidance of Great Persons
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Sixty-eight years has passed since the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was founded.
					 The birth of the DPRK was a significant event heralding that Korea emerged the country of Juche and the Koreans became an independent nation as a genuine master of the state and society.
					
					 Over the past 68 years, the DPRK has made a history of victory and glory under the guidance of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Guided by President Kim Il Sung, it defeated the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), thus defending the nation's freedom and independence and the gains of the revolution.
					
					 The DPRK successfully carried out the postwar reconstruction on the debris and then the socialist revolution and construction and thus turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 In the mid-1990s when the DPRK was under the worst difficulties, leader Kim Jong Il raised the banner of the Songun (military-first) politics to deter the hostile forces' military moves against it and defend the country and the nation's sovereignty and socialism.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, the DPRK could have a strong military muscle with self-reliant defense industry and rise to be a nuclear weapons state. And its people could turn out Juche-based iron, vinalon and fertilizer and secure the mastery of CNC technology, working world-startling miracles in various fields and building a lot of monumental edifices.
					
					 Today the strength of the DPRK is considerably increasing and its people's ideals are translated into a reality under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 As he protects the people's happiness and well-being and the dignity of the country with the Songun policy, an all-powerful treasured sword, the DPRK will prosper for good as Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Feats for Nation-building
articles.content:
Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Feats for Nation-building
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- September 9 marks the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Papers here Friday in editorials say that the founding of the DPRK was the birth of the Juche-oriented and popular independent and sovereign state, the first of its kind in the human history of nation-building, and a historic event that gave a new origin to the building of a great power.
					
					 The DPRK is the crystal of the outstanding ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on nation-building and their immortal leadership exploits and immensely patriotic devotion, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 The President set forth the Juche-based line of building a government and created noble experience for carrying it out in the secret forest of Mt. Paektu. After the liberation of the country he founded the DPRK on the basis of the solid foundation for nation-building.
					
					 The DPRK was founded on Sept. 9, Juche 37 (1948) out of unanimous will of all Koreans and thereby a genuine people's state unprecedented in history was built and since then a grand era of building a rich and powerful state by the concerted efforts of the people opened on this land.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a peerlessly elder statesman and patriot as he opened a new chapter for building a powerful socialist state and put the dignity and might of the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 Under his guidance the Socialist Constitution shed its rays as Kim Il Sung Constitution and the state machinery with the national defence as a pivot was established in the period when the Korean revolution faced the hardest difficulties. This was a special event that enabled the DPRK to bring about changes in its appearance and boost its might in every way.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the DPRK is a socialist state of Juche shining with original idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on nation-building and their immortal exploits, stressing only victory and glory are in store for the DPRK advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism with confidence under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Pro-Japanese Act Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Pro-Japanese Act Assailed 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Action for Punishing Lee Myung-Park-Geun Hye in south Korea made public a statement on Sept. 6 in protest against the puppet authorities for incriminating the act of punishing pro-Japanese traitor.
					 A south Korean young people recently punished the chief director of the "foundation for reconciliation and recovery" who was distributing the money to the victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army out of a billion yen provided by Japan under the guise of "consolation fund."
					
					 But the puppet authorities perpetrated such fascist tyranny as detaining the young man, incriminating his just deed.
					
					 The enraged victims are demanding the authorities shake hands off the issue of sexual slavery, and the overwhelming majority of south Koreans are opposing the humiliating "agreement" with Japan, the statement said.

articles.title: Korean Victims Remembered in Japan
articles.content:
Korean Victims Remembered in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Tokyo met at the monument to remember Korean victims who were killed at the great Kanto quake in Tokyo on September 1 on the lapse of 93 years since the Japanese imperialists ruthlessly killed Koreans during the quake.
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of those who were killed during the quake.
					
					 Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), in a memorial address said that the Japanese authorities have neither made apology and reparation to those killed during the quake nor probed the truth but have gone all the more despicable in their moves against the DPRK, Chongryon and Koreans while concealing the historic facts of the massacres of Koreans.
					
					 He demanded the Japanese authorities work for the earlier normalization of DPRK-Japan relations based on the proper liquidation of the past in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					 Kazuaki Ashizawa, representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, and Seizaburo Ekuchi, representative of the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge, made speeches.
					
					 Noting that the Japanese reactionaries are floating words that there were no massacres of Koreans during the great Kanto quake, the speakers said the Japanese reactionaries should properly approach history.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Bringing down S. Korean Puppet Regime
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Bringing down S. Korean Puppet Regime
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on September 5.
					 The statement said that scandals concerning Chongwadae, high-ranking bureaucrats of the ruling quarters and Park Geun Hye's clans have been disclosed one after another to face accusation and ridicule by the south Korean people from all walks of life.
					
					 It charged that Park who took office through all frauds and swindles during the past "presidential" election appointed those ambitious for power keen on selfish desire to important posts of Chongwadae, fostering scandals.
					
					 It underscored the need to wage a more dynamic struggle to throw overboard the Park Guen Hye regime, kingpin of scandals.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Finland, Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Finland, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu were held by the Communists' League of Finland and the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia on September 1 and 4 to mark the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Kalevi Wahrman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, and other speakers said that President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, enabling the Korean people to enjoy a genuine life as the masters of the country and their destiny for the first time in history.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the DPRK could win a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the confrontation with the U.S. and develop into a powerful socialist state, they noted.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people in their struggle to build a socialist power and reunify the country while meeting all challenges of the U.S. and its followers by dint of nuclear deterrence, they pointed out.
					
					 They expressed the will to conduct more brisk activities for supporting the DPRK advancing under the unfurled banner of independence.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo issued a bulletin on September 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 In an article titled "Why Korean socialism is invincible" under the banner-line "September 9, 2016, 68th founding anniversary of DPRK" the bulletin said.
					
					 Korean socialism is invincible.
					
					 It is applying the Juche idea, the people-centred idea.
					
					 Socialism centered on the popular masses was built in Korea as the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il valued and loved the people and devoted themselves to the people.
					
					 Korean socialism to which the idea of regarding the people as in Heaven, the idea of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, and HE Kim Jong Il, the eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea, is applied,  is being further consolidated thanks to HE Kim Jong Un's politics of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Lauded by Guinean Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Lauded by Guinean Personage
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, issued a statement on September 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said the brilliant history in which the DPRK has won victory after victory would be unthinkable apart from the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The statement noted that they are the distinguished leaders as they, during the whole period of leading the revolution, made the DPRK shed its rays as a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence before the world and provided the self-defensive capability to reliably defend the security of the country from the moves of the imperialists for aggression with the Songun leadership.
					
					 It said that their feats for the strengthening of the DPRK and the world revolution will be immortal.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Iranian Paper
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Iranian Paper
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Iran News on September 5 carried a special write-up on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK, illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The DPRK, founded on September 9, 1948, is a country with powerful political and military might no one dares provoke, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK, not a large country, with nearly seven decades of history has always won victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The DPRK has the law of victory. It is that the army and people led by the great leader are sure to win.
					
					 The clearer manifestation of the law of victory was seen during the Korean war ignited by the U.S.
					
					 In fact, the Korean war was a fierce war little short of a confrontation between rifles and A-bomb.
					
					 But under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung with outstanding military idea and distinguished commanding art the army and people of the DPRK shattered the U.S. imperialists' myth about "mightiness" for the first time in history, creating the legendary story about war victory.
					
					 The 60-odd year history of the Korean people since the war is a continuation of a war without gunfire with the U.S. imperialists and all other hostile forces.
					
					 The history and tradition of victory recorded by the DPRK are being successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The world-startling remarkable achievements are reported one after another in the building of a socialist power in the DPRK nearing a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Only brilliant victory is in store for the Korean people holding the great leader in high esteem.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Condemn U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Condemn U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 31 denouncing the U.S. and its followers for their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that the U.S. and its followers prodded the UN Security Council into announcing a press release taking issue with the DPRK over its recent test-fire of SLBM.
					
					 This is a wanton violation of the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and a grave political provocation against it, the statement noted.
					
					 The UNSC fully revealed once again that it is a reptile tool and marionette playing under the baton of the U.S. as it is turning down the DPRK's just complaint against the joint military exercise kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers, the statement pointed out.
					
					 The DPRK will in the future, too, resolutely shatter the political and military provocations of all the hostile forces, it noted.
					
					 The best way for the U.S. to dodge the strike of justice by the enraged Korean People's Army is to exercise self-prudence and self-restraint, not encroaching upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, it added.

articles.title: Lecture Given in Russia
articles.content:
Lecture Given in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia on September 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were officials and members of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia and the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism.
					
					 Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that since its birth on September 9, 1948 the DPRK has demonstrated only victory and glory.
					
					 The Korean army and people inflicted the first-ever big defeat on the U.S. imperialists who ignited a war of aggression to bring down the two-year-old DPRK in its cradle, and defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country, he noted.
					
					 The U.S. blustered that Korea could not rise up on its feet even after the lapse of a hundred years but the Korean people completed the rehabilitation and construction in a short span of time by the single-minded unity, rallied close around the Party, he pointed out.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group are resorting to ceaseless provocations to stifle the DPRK, he said, and went on:
					
					 Korea should be reunified by the Korean people themselves without foreign interference according to the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 We will significantly celebrate the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK together with the Korean people, extending invariable support and solidarity to their struggle for the prosperity and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Realizada con exito la prueba de explosion de nueva ojiva nuclear en la RPDC
articles.content:
Realizada con exito la prueba de explosion de nueva ojiva nuclear en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Instituto de Armas Nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 9 la siguiente declaracion:
					Segun el proyecto del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la construccion de las fuerzas nucleares estrategicas, los cientificos y tecnicos del Instituto de Armas Nucleares realizaron en el campo de experimentos del norte una prueba de explosion nuclear para evaluar el poder de la ojiva nuclear recien desarrollada. 
					
					Con motivo de esta prueba exitosa, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio calidas felicitaciones a los cientificos y tecnicos nucleares del campo de experimentos del norte. 
					
					En la presente prueba nuclear fueron revisados y confirmados definitivamente la estructura, las especificaciones de funcionamiento, la eficiencia y el poder de la ojiva nuclear estandarizada para ser cargada en los cohetes balisticos estrategicos que disponen las unidades de artilleria Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Segun el resultado de analisis, se ha comprobado que los valores de medicion sobre el potencial de explosion y los coeficientes de uso de sustancias nucleares son iguales a los calculados y que no hubo ninguna fuga de sustancias radiactivas ni influencias negativas al ambiente ecologico del contorno. 
					
					La estandarizacion de la ojiva nuclear permite producir comoquiera en cantidades necesarias los diferentes tipos de ojivas nucleares minimizadas, aligeradas y diversificadas de mayor poder ofensivo dominando la tecnologia de produccion y uso de varias sustancias fisionables. 
					
					Asi, el armamento nuclear de nuestro pais se ha situado en un nivel mas alto. 
					
					El presente ensayo de explosion de ojiva nuclear deviene un eslabon de las contramedidas reales frente a la amenaza y los alborotos de sancion de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles que niegan persistentemente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, digno pais poseedor de las armas nucleares y cuestionan perversamente nuestro ejercicio del derecho de autodefensa.
					
					  Igualmente constituye la manifestacion de la voluntad ultraintransigente de nuestro partido y pueblo de que estan dispuestos a dar contraataque a los enemigos si estos nos atentan.
					
					  Continuaran las medidas por el fortalecimiento cualitativo y cuantitativo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado para defender la dignidad y el derecho a la existencia de nuestro pais y preservar la paz verdadera desde la creciente amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.

articles.title: IAN del MINREX rechaza disparate anti-RPDC de funcionario de Casa Blanca
articles.content:
IAN del MINREX rechaza disparate anti-RPDC de funcionario de Casa Blanca
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que el portavoz del Consejo de Seguridad Nacional de la Casa Blanca volvio a pronunciar disparates contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos (IAN) del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 9 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Segun trascendidos, en una reciente conferencia de prensa concedida en Vientiane, Laos, el portavoz del Consejo de Seguridad Nacional de la Casa Blanca disparateo que redoblara la vigilancia en la ejecucion de sancion anti-Norte de Corea (RPDC) y que EE.UU. puede cambiar su criterio si el Norte de Corea renuncia el plan nuclear y de misil balistico. 
					
					Aun en medio de la sancion superintensa de las fuerzas hostiles encabezadas por EE.UU., la RPDC entro en la primera fila de potencias militares dispuestas perfectamente de la capacidad de ataque nuclear, lo cual es el resultado del espiritu de autofortalecimiento. 
					
					La politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., que se tornan cada dia mas abiertos, no trajeron otro resultado que la elevacion escalonada de la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la RPDC. 
					
					La unilateral campana de sancion y aplastamiento de EE.UU. es crimen de lesa humanidad que persigue el derrocamiento de un Estado soberano y viola su derecho al desarrollo y a la subsistencia. 
					
					La "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que aduce EE.UU., no pasa de ser un documento criminal carente de imparcialidad, legitimidad y moralidad porque reviste el caracter vengativo prohibido por la ley internacional. 
					
					EE.UU. insiste tanto en la ubicacion de THAAD en el Sur de Corea y en la intensificacion de sancion y presion anti-RPDC, pero lo consideramos como estertor de los derrotados y consternados ante el inagotable poderio militar de nuestro pais. 
					
					El desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares es la linea estrategica de la RPDC a ser mantenida siempre mientras continuen la amenaza nuclear y las arbitrariedades de los imperialistas. 
					
					Esperar que la RPDC se desvie de esa linea es una ilusion nunca realizable.
					
					EE.UU. no debe menospreciar nunca la indoblegable fuerza espiritual y el inagotable poderio de la RPDC y vera claro como esta se levanta rompiendo las garras de sancion, bloqueo y presion.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete por el 68o aniversario de fundacion de la RPDC
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete por el 68o aniversario de fundacion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el banquete por el 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales, los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, los funcionarios militares y civiles ejemplares en la campana de 200 dias de fidelidad, los benemeritos, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Pronuncio un discurso Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					El orador dijo que el mes en curso de este ano significativo en que se celebro el VII Congreso del PTC hace recordar con emocion la trayectoria orgullosa de la RPDC que ha logrado siempre victorias bajo la guia de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					Agrego que la RPDC brilla en la palestra internacional como potencia del Juche caracterizada por la independencia y el Songun, invicta potencia militar y pais del pueblo donde se da primacia a las masas populares. 
					
					Enfatizo que bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, la RPDC marchara rectamente por la invariable ruta de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo y levantara sobre el territorio patrio la mejor potencia del mundo y paraiso del pueblo manteniendo la linea general del PTC y el principio de dar primacia al autofortalecimiento. 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC abrira el camino de reunificacion independiente con el ideal de la independencia nacional y la gran unidad nacional, garantizara la paz y la seguridad del mundo y ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones exteriores conforme a la posicion de potencia independiente y pais poseedor de armas nucleares, concluyo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 9 V. Putin, Presidente de la Federacion Rusa. 
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Respetado Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un.
					
					Le extiendo mis sinceras felicitaciones a Vd., en ocasion del 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Las relaciones entre la Federacion Rusa y la RPDC tienen tradicionalmente el caracter amistoso.
					
					Estoy convencido de que desarrollar mas las cooperaciones bilaterales de beneficio mutuo en varios dominios se conviene a los intereses fundamentales de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y contribuira a intensificar la seguridad y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y toda la region de Noroeste Asiatico.
					
					Formulo votos a Vd. por su buena salud y sus exitos, y la felicidad y el bienestar a todo el pueblo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					El texto senala:
					
					Estimado companero:
					
					Con motivo de celebrarse la Fiesta Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, le extiendo nuestras mas calidas felicitaciones. 
					
					Reciba un fraternal saludo.
